I am a lecturer at Politeknik APP Jakarta and Universitas Indonesia. I sometimes help various organisation with consultancy. I spent my free time playing some games and guitars. Do check my twitter and blog (mostly in Indonesian).

## Affiliations

- Lecturer at Politeknik APP Jakarta
- Guest lecturer at Universitas Indonesia
- Senior fellow at Center for Indonesian Policy Studies [(CIPS)](https://www.cips-indonesia.org/about)

## Education

- Ph.D. in economics from Crawford School of Public Policy, Australian National University [(ANU)](https://crawford.anu.edu.au/people/phd/krisna-gupta)
- M.S.E. in economics from Universitas Indonesia (Joint-degree with VU)
- M.Sc. in economics from VU University Amsterdam (joint-degree with UI)
